short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension full of fun cute snails to say hi to you throughout the day when you click on the icon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Need a cute snail to brighten up your day? With Snail Wave, you click the extension icon to get a cute snail image popup. You can also click a button to see more snail images. It is a great extension to bring you a smile throughout your day.
